sense.def:
To convey information or feelings
pomeni povzročiti, da nekdo spozna ali razume podatke ali čustva.

seg.quote: Newspapers convey the impression that the war is over.
...trying to convey that it did not really matter.

sense.def:
To convey someone or something to a place
pomeni nekoga ali nekaj prepeljati na neki kraj;

seg.quote: ...the truck conveying Daniel and the work crew.
